title: Why is my phone so broken, my face id broke first week, it wont charge, and will just shut off rando
content: This is a POS, both my bottom speaker, and my face id failed first week, and I can't get them back to save my soul, nobody will work ok my phone, even best buy wouldn't do anything, I haven't even had it a year, and now my charger port is broke, and it will barley charge
